overview: Tax cheats Moe, Larry and Shemp decide they're so good at cheating the government, that they start a business as crooked tax advisors. They become rich, but an undercover agent from the IRS gets the goods on them, and its off to jail for the stooges.
tagline: The Stooges cheat on their income taxes and get nabbed by the IRS.
title: Income Tax Sappy
